commits.comment: Initial project structure
First commit, test commit access.
Adding main LICENSE, NOTICE and DISCLAIMER files as per ASF policy
Adding parent pom for Nuvem project
Renaming modules, refactoring packages, etc
svn propset svn:ignore
svn propset svn:ignore
Corrected, sub module POM files refer to a wrong module name as the parent artifactId.
Moving to Snapshot version of Tuscany as we need some fixes related to GAE support
Bumping up the version of the store-catalog deployed to GAE
Updating to latest GAE SDK
Renaming composition name to make it easier to differentiate apps in the GAE env
Bumping up the application version at GAE
Renaming composition name to make it easier to differentiate apps in the GAE env
Making handling catalog references more flexible
Adding noarg default constructor
Tweaking pom to have proper GAE dependencies to avoid runtime issues
Minor change to switch to isEmpty()
Fixing up Apache License headers and other minor updates to confguration files
Work around the ClassCastException
Tweaking GAE dependencies to avoid Eclipse complains
A standalone store sample connecting to a python catalog from gae
NUVEM-1 - Applying patch from Avdhesh Yadav to add test cases to GAE DocumentStore implementations
Installing test dependencies required by NUVEM-1
Refactoring catalog interface for compatibility with python catalog interface where get is a reserved rest method name convention
Removing unused dependency
Updating test case to reflect recently catalog content changes
Refactoring catalog interface in store-assets for compatibility with python catalog interface where get is a reserved rest method name convention
Add a local Catalog component. Change list of fruits to help distinguish the different catalogs.
Adding standalone in-memory implementation of DocumentServices based on simple HashMap
Tidyng up GAE implementation for DocumentService
Refactoring ShoppingCart to use a reference to a DocumentService component to allow easily rewiring different storage utility components
Bumping up the version to avoid overriding stable versions of the demo
Fixing RAT issues
Updating to Tuscany 2.0-M5.1 to get GAE related fixes
NUVEM-6 - Applying patch from John Pradeep with new XMPP component support
Formating code
Adding missing Apache License headers and validating with rat (mvn -Prat)
Changing test cases to run on port 8085 instead of 8080
Fixing store standalone tests
Upgrade to latest Apache parent pom
Apply John's patch from JIRA issue NUVEM-7. Modifications to the XMPP API and store sample.
Strawman components for simple parallel programming. No list support yet.
Starting to add components to work with lists, mapping and filtering.
Standalone XMPP server based on Vysper
Move component implementation scripts under a nuvem package.
Add more useful component implementations to work with urls, text, operators, iterate through lists, maps etc.
Make 'list' component easier to compose by using one reference per element in the list, instead of a 'cons'-like linked list construction pattern. Rename the original list component to 'cons'.
Replaced ${pom.version} by  ${project.version} as it deprecated in Maven 3.0.
Add components that eval a python expression and execute a python statement.
Add .gitignore file to tell git to ignore build outputs.
Add components to format and parse text. Change join and replace components to support unwired references.
Added maven-gae-plugin for appengine samples.
Added exec-maven-plugin to run Python tests.
Exclude /components/comp-name prefix from path returned by the path component.
Add a few components to help work with social APIs.
Add components to help apps handle user interactions, timer and location change events.

Added necessary javadocs and refactored the code to provide a XMPPConnector implementation to the XMPPEndPoint which will abstract the process of establishing connection to the XMPPServer so that there could be different strategies later.

Added necessary javadocs and refactored the code to provide a XMPPConnector implementation to the XMPPEndPoint which will abstract the process of establishing connection to the XMPPServer so that there could be different strategies later.
Implemented XMPPConnector implementation and restructured the folders into client/server to provide standalone XMPP server implementation
composite file wiring xmpp component and its connector
Refactor and cleanup assoc. button, format and parse components. Add a date component.
Add database and search components.
Structured the code to support Different Connectors 1. Simple Connector - unsecured connection to the XMPP Server 2. SSL Connector - secure way to connect to the XMPP Server
Implemented Asynchronous XMPP Reciever for stand-alone XMPP Server and cleaned up some code.
Implemented Asynchronous XMPP Reciever for stand-alone XMPP Server and cleaned up some code.
Implemented Asynchronous XMPP Reciever for stand-alone XMPP Server and cleaned up some code.
Refactor event entry point services.
Add a few search components.
Add a few more list processing and math / computing components. Minor improvements to list, text and date components to make them a bit more robust.
Refactor start, stop, and timer event components.
Adding the initial XMPP presence management code, this code will be revised/refactored and appropriate test cases and sample code for store app will be added as the next step
organized packages more appropriately to support various xmpp features like messaging, presence management, pubsub etc
organized packages more appropriately to support various xmpp features like messaging, presence management, pubsub etc
Initial Implementation code for Google XMPP Presence Management
Standalone XMPP Presence Management implementation + simplifying few class names
upgraded GAE API to the latest one which provides the new Presence management support, also modified a test case to reflect the package structure reorganization

all sample modules will be moved to a parent module - "nuvem-samples"
sample applications grouped under a single parent nuvem-samples
sample applications grouped under a single parent nuvem-samples
features will be added as a package to the project specific to cloud platform
module restructuring + few folder structure changes to keep it consistent with all other modules
module restructuring + few folder structure changes to keep it consistent with all other modules
module restructuring + few folder structure changes to keep it consistent with all other modules
updated the modules for the parent project

removing .classpath which was added by mistake

Added necessary APIs to all XMPP clients to receive presence updates from the XMPP server
Refactor and minor fixes to assoc and search components. Add a keychain component.
Refactor location component and add two geocoding components.
-upgraded GAE to a latest version -updated few pom to reflect parent/module relation -corrected a failing testcase

Add simple HTML generator component implementations.

configured sample app to make use of the XMPP Receiver in GAE
added missing library like the tuscany web runtime and jaxb databinding
Set svn:ignore property for generated .pyc files. It would be  great if we can move them into target folder so that Maven clean can  remove them.
Applied first patch for NUVEM-9 - Google Data Service support.
changed code to load certificate from class path which is required to start the vysper server
updated proper namespaces, promoted required nuvem components and exported the namesapce for external use
refactored store.composite to use <implementation.composite> to make use of nuvem service

refactored to place the common code (which broadcasts recieved messages to listeners) in single place and also promoted xmpp service for standalone implementation

--corrected the google presence reciever servlet to broadcast presence changes to listeners --modified the store application to demonstrate how to listen to presence changes and respond to such changes
Add components that generate CSS transforms and transitions.
Add components that implement a few useful math functions.
Implement type checks, checks for None values and automatic type conversions when necessary. Add a few more test cases.
Applied latest patch for NUVEM-9.
Temporally disable AmazonDataServiceImplTestCase.
Remove unnecessary import of sys.stderr.
Remove unwanted package.
Fixed the build failure. CassandraDataService require  external Cassandra instance to run this test case.
Removed deprecated ${pom.version}
Added sample modules to  the top level POM so that samples also build with top level build.
We should not keep IDE specific config files here.
Removed tuscany-sca-data-api dependency from Nuvem API . Now Nuvem API only depends on tuscany-sca-api.
NUVEM-13  - Introduced  a new module named nuvem-sca-config to isolate all Tuscany dependencies. Some one can use tuscany to  configure Nuvem components by making  this module as a dependency.

Adding generated serialVersionUID to avoid eclipse warnings
